patterns.pattern:
on click
                            set value to 'Hello there.' then
                            append ' General Kenobi.' to value then
                            set my.innerHTML to value
patterns.syntax:
on click
                            set value to '<selector>' then
                            append '<selector>' to value then
                            set my.<class> to value

patterns.pattern:
on click
                            set value to [1,2,3]
                            append 4 to value
                            set my.innerHTML to value as String
patterns.syntax:
on click
                            set value to [<selector>,<selector>,<selector>]
                            append <selector> to value
                            set my.<class> to value as String

patterns.pattern:
on click
                            set result to [1,2,3]
                            append 4
                            put it as String into me
patterns.syntax:
on click
                            set result to [<selector>,<selector>,<selector>]
                            append <selector>
                            put it as String into me

patterns.pattern: on click set a to 1 ' +
patterns.syntax: on click set a to <selector> ' +

patterns.pattern:
on click
				repeat 2 times
					for x in ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D']
						if (x != 'D') then
							put 'success ' + x  + '. ' at end of me
							continue
							put 'FAIL!!. ' at end of me
						end
						put 'expected D. ' at end of me
					end
				end
patterns.syntax:
on click
				repeat <selector> times
					for x in ['<selector>', '<selector>', '<selector>', '<selector>']
						if (x != '<selector>') then
							put '<selector>' + x  + '<selector>' at end of me
							continue
							put '<selector>' at end of me
						end
						put '<selector>' at end of me
					end
				end

patterns.pattern:
on click
				repeat 2 times
					for x in ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D']
						if x is 'C'
						  break
						end
						put x at end of me
					end
				end
patterns.syntax:
on click
				repeat <selector> times
					for x in ['<selector>', '<selector>', '<selector>', '<selector>']
						if x is '<selector>'
						  break
						end
						put x at end of me
					end
				end

patterns.syntax: on click set x to <selector> then put `test\\${x} test ${x} test\\$x test $x test \\$x test \\${x} test$x test_$x test_${x} test-$x test.$x` into my.<class>

patterns.syntax: on click set var to [<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>] then put var[..<selector>] as String into #<id>

patterns.syntax: on click set var to [<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>] then put var[<selector>..<selector>] as String into #<id>

patterns.pattern: on click set index to 3 then set var to [0,1,2,3,4,5] then put var[(index-1)..(index+1)] as String into #d1
patterns.syntax: on click set index to <selector> then set var to [<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>] then put var[(index-<selector>)..(index+<selector>)] as String into #<id>

patterns.pattern: on click set var to [0,1,2,3,4,5] then put var[3 ..] as String into #d1
patterns.syntax: on click set var to [<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>] then put var[<selector> ..] as String into #<id>

patterns.syntax: on click set var to [<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>,<selector>] then put var[<selector>..] as String into #<id>

patterns.pattern: on click put <input.include/> as Values into my.customData
patterns.syntax: on click put <selector> as Values into my.<class>

patterns.pattern:
on mousedown
	  log 'starting'
      set elapsed to 0
      repeat until event pointerup
		  if elapsed < 100
			wait 1s
			log 'waited'
			set elapsed to elapsed + 10
			continue
		  end
		  log 'breaking'
		  break
      end
      log 'done'
patterns.syntax:
on mousedown
	  log '<selector>'
      set elapsed to <selector>
      repeat until event pointerup
		  if elapsed <selector>
			wait 1s
			log '<selector>'
			set elapsed to elapsed + <selector>
			continue
		  end
		  log '<selector>'
		  break
      end
      log '<selector>'

patterns.pattern:
on click fetch 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts' as Object
	              log it
                  for x in it
                    log x
patterns.syntax:
on click fetch '<selector>' as Object
	              log it
                  for x in it
                    log x

patterns.pattern:
on change
    log 'change'
  end
  on load
    log 'trigger'
    trigger change
  end
patterns.syntax:
on change
    log '<selector>'
  end
  on load
    log '<selector>'
    trigger change
  end

patterns.pattern: on click add @foo='bar doh' to me
patterns.syntax: on click add @foo='<selector>' to me

patterns.pattern: on input halt
patterns.syntax: on input halt

patterns.pattern: on click halt
patterns.syntax: on click halt

patterns.pattern:
on click
               put '.' at the end of the next <output/>
               log #throw
               log #throw's checked
               if the #throw's checked is true
                 log 'throwing!'
                 throw 'foo'
               end
            catch e
               log e
               put 'x' at the end of the next <output/>
patterns.syntax:
on click
               put '<selector>' at the end of the next <selector>
               log #<id>
               log #<id>'<selector>'s checked is true
                 log '<selector>'
                 throw '<selector>'
               end
            catch e
               log e
               put '<selector>' at the end of the next <selector>

patterns.pattern:
on intersection[detail.intersecting] 1 having threshold 0.5
	          transition opacity to 1
            on intersection[not detail.intersecting] having threshold 0.5
	          transition opacity to 0
patterns.syntax:
on intersection[detail.<class>] <selector> having threshold <selector>
	          transition opacity to <selector>
            on intersection[not detail.<class>] having threshold <selector>
	          transition opacity to <selector>

patterns.pattern: on click send open to #modal
patterns.syntax: on click send open to #<id>

patterns.pattern:
on open
            breakpoint
            remove .hidden add .overflow-hidden to <body/>
            wait a tick then focus() first <input/> in me
        end
        on close or keyup[key is 'Escape'] from <body/>
            remove .overflow-hidden from <body/>
            trigger hide
            wait a tick then add .hidden
        end
        on keydown[key is 'Tab' and not shiftKey]
            call focusNextIn(activeElement of document, me) then halt
        end
        on keydown[key is 'Tab' and shiftKey]
            call focusPreviousIn(activeElement of document, me) then halt
        end
patterns.syntax:
on open
            breakpoint
            remove .<class> add .<class> to <selector>
            wait a tick then focus() first <selector> in me
        end
        on close or keyup[key is '<selector>'] from <selector>
            remove .<class> from <selector>
            trigger hide
            wait a tick then add .<class>
        end
        on keydown[key is '<selector>' and not shiftKey]
            call focusNextIn(activeElement of document, me) then halt
        end
        on keydown[key is '<selector>' and shiftKey]
            call focusPreviousIn(activeElement of document, me) then halt
        end

patterns.pattern:
on open from #modal
                        add .ease-out .opacity-0 .duration-300
                        wait 0s remove .opacity-0 add .opacity-100
                        wait 0.3s remove .ease-out .duration-300
                    end
                    on hide from #modal
                        add .ease-in .duration-200 .opacity-0
                        wait 0s remove .opacity-100
                        wait 0.2s remove .ease-in .duration-200 .opacity-0
                    end
patterns.syntax:
on open from #<id>
                        add .<class> .<class><selector> .<class><selector>
                        wait 0s remove .<class><selector> add .<class><selector>
                        wait <selector>.<class> remove .<class> .<class><selector>
                    end
                    on hide from #<id>
                        add .<class> .<class><selector> .<class><selector>
                        wait 0s remove .<class><selector>
                        wait <selector>.<class> remove .<class> .<class><selector> .<class><selector>
                    end

patterns.pattern:
on open from #modal
                        js(me) me.classList.add('ease-out','opacity-0','duration-1000','translate-y-4','sm:translate-y-0','sm:scale-95') end
                        wait 0s js(me) me.classList.remove('opacity-0','translate-y-4','sm:translate-y-0','sm:scale-95') end
                        js(me) me.classList.add('opacity-100','translate-y-0','sm:scale-100') end
                        then js(me) me.classList.remove('ease-out','duration-1000')
                    end
                    on hide from #modal
                        js(me) me.classList.add('ease-in','duration-200','translate-y-4','sm:translate-y-0') end
                        wait 0s js(me) me.classList.remove('opacity-100','translate-y-0','sm:scale-100') end
                        then js(me) me.classList.remove('ease-in','duration-200','translate-y-4','sm:translate-y-0')
                    end
patterns.syntax:
on open from #<id>
                        js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        wait 0s js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        then js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>')
                    end
                    on hide from #<id>
                        js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        wait 0s js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        then js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>')
                    end

events.pattern:
on click
				repeat 2 times
					for x in ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D']
						if (x != 'D') then
							put 'success ' + x  + '. ' at end of me
							continue
							put 'FAIL!!. ' at end of me
						end
						put 'expected D. ' at end of me
					end
				end
events.syntax:
on click
				repeat <selector> times
					for x in ['<selector>', '<selector>', '<selector>', '<selector>']
						if (x != '<selector>') then
							put '<selector>' + x  + '<selector>' at end of me
							continue
							put '<selector>' at end of me
						end
						put '<selector>' at end of me
					end
				end

events.pattern:
on click
				repeat 2 times
					for x in ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D']
						if x is 'C'
						  break
						end
						put x at end of me
					end
				end
events.syntax:
on click
				repeat <selector> times
					for x in ['<selector>', '<selector>', '<selector>', '<selector>']
						if x is '<selector>'
						  break
						end
						put x at end of me
					end
				end

events.pattern:
on mousedown
	  log 'starting'
      set elapsed to 0
      repeat until event pointerup
		  if elapsed < 100
			wait 1s
			log 'waited'
			set elapsed to elapsed + 10
			continue
		  end
		  log 'breaking'
		  break
      end
      log 'done'
events.syntax:
on mousedown
	  log '<selector>'
      set elapsed to <selector>
      repeat until event pointerup
		  if elapsed <selector>
			wait 1s
			log '<selector>'
			set elapsed to elapsed + <selector>
			continue
		  end
		  log '<selector>'
		  break
      end
      log '<selector>'

events.pattern:
on click fetch 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts' as Object
	              log it
                  for x in it
                    log x
events.syntax:
on click fetch '<selector>' as Object
	              log it
                  for x in it
                    log x

events.pattern:
on change
    log 'change'
  end
  on load
    log 'trigger'
    trigger change
  end
events.syntax:
on change
    log '<selector>'
  end
  on load
    log '<selector>'
    trigger change
  end

events.pattern: on click add @foo='bar doh' to me
events.syntax: on click add @foo='<selector>' to me

events.pattern: on input halt
events.syntax: on input halt

events.pattern: on click halt
events.syntax: on click halt

events.pattern:
on click
               put '.' at the end of the next <output/>
               log #throw
               log #throw's checked
               if the #throw's checked is true
                 log 'throwing!'
                 throw 'foo'
               end
            catch e
               log e
               put 'x' at the end of the next <output/>
events.syntax:
on click
               put '<selector>' at the end of the next <selector>
               log #<id>
               log #<id>'<selector>'s checked is true
                 log '<selector>'
                 throw '<selector>'
               end
            catch e
               log e
               put '<selector>' at the end of the next <selector>

events.pattern:
on intersection[detail.intersecting] 1 having threshold 0.5
	          transition opacity to 1
            on intersection[not detail.intersecting] having threshold 0.5
	          transition opacity to 0
events.syntax:
on intersection[detail.<class>] <selector> having threshold <selector>
	          transition opacity to <selector>
            on intersection[not detail.<class>] having threshold <selector>
	          transition opacity to <selector>

events.pattern: on click send open to #modal
events.syntax: on click send open to #<id>

events.pattern:
on open
            breakpoint
            remove .hidden add .overflow-hidden to <body/>
            wait a tick then focus() first <input/> in me
        end
        on close or keyup[key is 'Escape'] from <body/>
            remove .overflow-hidden from <body/>
            trigger hide
            wait a tick then add .hidden
        end
        on keydown[key is 'Tab' and not shiftKey]
            call focusNextIn(activeElement of document, me) then halt
        end
        on keydown[key is 'Tab' and shiftKey]
            call focusPreviousIn(activeElement of document, me) then halt
        end
events.syntax:
on open
            breakpoint
            remove .<class> add .<class> to <selector>
            wait a tick then focus() first <selector> in me
        end
        on close or keyup[key is '<selector>'] from <selector>
            remove .<class> from <selector>
            trigger hide
            wait a tick then add .<class>
        end
        on keydown[key is '<selector>' and not shiftKey]
            call focusNextIn(activeElement of document, me) then halt
        end
        on keydown[key is '<selector>' and shiftKey]
            call focusPreviousIn(activeElement of document, me) then halt
        end

events.pattern:
on open from #modal
                        add .ease-out .opacity-0 .duration-300
                        wait 0s remove .opacity-0 add .opacity-100
                        wait 0.3s remove .ease-out .duration-300
                    end
                    on hide from #modal
                        add .ease-in .duration-200 .opacity-0
                        wait 0s remove .opacity-100
                        wait 0.2s remove .ease-in .duration-200 .opacity-0
                    end
events.syntax:
on open from #<id>
                        add .<class> .<class><selector> .<class><selector>
                        wait 0s remove .<class><selector> add .<class><selector>
                        wait <selector>.<class> remove .<class> .<class><selector>
                    end
                    on hide from #<id>
                        add .<class> .<class><selector> .<class><selector>
                        wait 0s remove .<class><selector>
                        wait <selector>.<class> remove .<class> .<class><selector> .<class><selector>
                    end

events.pattern:
on open from #modal
                        js(me) me.classList.add('ease-out','opacity-0','duration-1000','translate-y-4','sm:translate-y-0','sm:scale-95') end
                        wait 0s js(me) me.classList.remove('opacity-0','translate-y-4','sm:translate-y-0','sm:scale-95') end
                        js(me) me.classList.add('opacity-100','translate-y-0','sm:scale-100') end
                        then js(me) me.classList.remove('ease-out','duration-1000')
                    end
                    on hide from #modal
                        js(me) me.classList.add('ease-in','duration-200','translate-y-4','sm:translate-y-0') end
                        wait 0s js(me) me.classList.remove('opacity-100','translate-y-0','sm:scale-100') end
                        then js(me) me.classList.remove('ease-in','duration-200','translate-y-4','sm:translate-y-0')
                    end
events.syntax:
on open from #<id>
                        js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        wait 0s js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        then js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>')
                    end
                    on hide from #<id>
                        js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        wait 0s js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>') end
                        then js(me) me.<class>.<class>('<selector>','<selector>','<selector>','<selector>')
                    end

events.pattern: on click trigger close
events.syntax: on click trigger close

events.pattern: on click put MySocket.rpc.echo('foo') into my.innerHTML
events.syntax: on click put MySocket.<class>.<class>('<selector>') into my.<class>

events.pattern:
on click set name to MySocket.rpc.ask('What is your name? ')
                    put 'Nice to meet you, $name' into my.innerText
events.syntax:
on click set name to MySocket.<class>.<class>('<selector>')
                    put '<selector>' into my.<class>

events.pattern: on click put MySocket.rpc.throw('Nice...') into my.innerHTML
events.syntax: on click put MySocket.<class>.<class>('<selector>') into my.<class>

events.pattern: on click send foo(bar:'doh', rey:42) to MySocket
events.syntax: on click send foo(bar:'<selector>', rey:<selector>) to MySocket
